alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Stephenson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 9:44AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Stephenson County through 1030 AM CDT... At 943 AM CDT, emergency management reported a strong thunderstorm near Shannon, or 8 miles southwest of Freeport, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Dime size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Freeport and Cedarville around 955 AM CDT. Dakota and Ridott around 1000 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Rock City and Davis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
